about.name: Phuket
about.info_text: Phuket is Thailand's largest island and a popular destination in the Andaman Sea. Known for its stunning beaches, vibrant nightlife, and cultural heritage, Phuket offers a diverse range of experiences for travelers. Visitors can explore the bustling streets of Patong, relax on the pristine shores of Karon Beach, and discover the rich history of Old Phuket Town. The island also serves as a gateway to nearby attractions, including the Phi Phi Islands and Phang Nga Bay. Whether you're seeking adventure, relaxation, or cultural immersion, Phuket has something for everyone.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 400,000
Official Language: Thai
Currency: Thai Baht (THB)
Time Zone: Indochina Time (ICT, UTC+07:00)
Climate: Tropical monsoon climate with a rainy season from May to October and a dry season from November to April.

attractions_card.title: Patong Beach
attractions_card.description: Phuket's most famous beach, known for its vibrant nightlife, water sports, and entertainment options.

attractions_card.title: Karon Beach
attractions_card.description: A beautiful, family-friendly beach with a relaxed atmosphere, ideal for swimming and sunbathing.

attractions_card.title: Old Phuket Town
attractions_card.description: Explore the historic district with its colorful Sino-Portuguese architecture, museums, and vibrant street art.

attractions_card.title: Big Buddha
attractions_card.description: Visit the iconic 45-meter-tall statue of the Big Buddha and enjoy panoramic views of the island.

attractions_card.title: Phi Phi Islands
attractions_card.description: Embark on day trips to the stunning Phi Phi Islands for snorkeling, scuba diving, and beach adventures.

attractions_card.title: Phang Nga Bay
attractions_card.description: Discover the famous James Bond Island and the surreal limestone karsts of Phang Nga Bay on boat tours.

attractions_card.title: Wat Chalong
attractions_card.description: Visit the largest and most important Buddhist temple in Phuket, known for its spiritual significance.

attractions_card.title: Elephant Sanctuaries
attractions_card.description: Interact with rescued elephants in ethical sanctuaries focused on conservation and animal welfare.

food_card.title: Thai Street Food
food_card.description: Indulge in a variety of authentic Thai dishes from street vendors, including pad Thai, green curry, and mango sticky rice.

food_card.title: Seafood Feasts
food_card.description: Enjoy fresh seafood at beachfront restaurants, with grilled fish, prawns, and crab on the menu.

food_card.title: Tom Yum Soup
food_card.description: Savor the bold flavors of Tom Yum, a spicy and sour Thai soup with shrimp or chicken.

food_card.title: Coconut Delights
food_card.description: Treat yourself to coconut-based desserts, such as coconut ice cream and coconut pancakes.

food_card.title: Mango Shakes
food_card.description: Stay refreshed with delicious mango shakes and fruit smoothies available at local eateries.

hotels_card.title: Beachfront Resorts
hotels_card.description: Choose from luxurious beachfront resorts with private beaches and world-class amenities.

hotels_card.title: Boutique Hotels
hotels_card.description: Discover unique boutique hotels in Old Phuket Town, offering a blend of history and style.

hotels_card.title: Budget Accommodations
hotels_card.description: Find budget-friendly guesthouses and hostels for cost-conscious travelers.

hotels_card.title: Villa Rentals
hotels_card.description: Experience the privacy of villa rentals with private pools and personalized services.

transport_card.title: Phuket International Airport
transport_card.description: The main airport serving Phuket, providing both domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: Tuk-Tuks and Taxis
transport_card.description: Tuk-tuks and taxis are readily available for convenient local transportation on the island.

transport_card.title: Renting Scooters
transport_card.description: Rent scooters to explore the island independently, but remember to drive with caution.

transport_card.title: Songthaews
transport_card.description: Use songthaews (shared pickup trucks) for affordable transportation between beaches and towns.

transport_card.title: Boat Tours
transport_card.description: Take boat tours to nearby islands and attractions, including the Phi Phi Islands and Phang Nga Bay.
